dcterms:description: A dataset containing geo-tagged reports sent mainly by SMS after the Haiti 2010 earthquake, categorized by Ushahidi volunteers to describe various emergency situations.
dcterms:title: Ushahidi dataset

dcterms:description: A comprehensive analysis of building damage in the 12 January 2010 Mw7 Haiti earthquake using high-resolution satellite and aerial imagery.
dcterms:title: UNOSAT building damage assessment dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing crowdsourced labels from volunteers who marked features in satellite images showing damage to Tacloban, Philippines, after Typhoon Haiyan/Yolanda.
dcterms:title: Zooniverse Planetary Response Network dataset
